      • getSingletonCapability

        @Nonnull
Capability getSingletonCapability​(Resource resource,
                                  String namespace)
        Returns a capability of the given namespace which exists only as a singleton in scope of the given resource.

        If the requested capability doesn't exist, then a new one is created and set as a root capability.

        Parameters:
        resource -
        namespace -
        Returns:

      • getSingletonCapability

        @Nullable
Capability getSingletonCapability​(Resource resource,
                                  String namespace,
                                  boolean create)
        Returns a capability of the given namespace which exists only as a singleton in scope of the given resource.

        If the requested capability doesn't exist, then either a new one is created and set as a root capability (if create is set to true) or null is returned.

        Parameters:
        resource -
        namespace -
        Returns:
